steps.name: User Launch the Url
User click the Homepage SingIn Button
User navigates to the login page "Customer Login"
User enters Username "velandg10@gmail.com" in the Username Field
User enters password "Velan@1995"  in the Password Field
User clicks on the signIn button
User should be redirected to  the dashboard  "Welcome, Velan Velli!"
User select the Mens top Jacket Selection
User selects the "Montana Wind Jacket"
User Select L size
User Select  Red Color
User adds the jacket to the cart
User click the Shoping Cart
User proceeds to checkout
User fills in the mandatory shipping address with the following details
User selects the standard shipping method
User places the order
